column4: then you told me to upgrade all my packages which I just noted that I am doing now

and test ubuntu's broken shipped package of VLC....
>> ok, i just got out of dep-hell.  Do I distupgrade and then reinstall X aand gdm and gnome and all thatt or do i reinstall them then distupgrade?
dependency hell
when you have things trying to install or remove and they won't due to dependency issues but they lock your system because they're trying to install/uninstall
(you can't do anything else until they're fixed)
ubuntu doesnt really have that problem
fedora is another story :)
tell that to my machine here :)
apt crashed on isntalling a python package about a year and a half ago, i haven't used the system since then due to the issues
it could be the studio ppa
no, it was a standard package that crashed during install due to a server update coincidental with the install
idk
(or a cron job interfering, it's really not clear)
anyway, that's fixed now
give it a few days and then google it
it happened a year and a half ago.
do what I did, install Fedora 13
